name: CVE-2013-1286
description: The USB kernel-mode drivers in Microsoft Windows XP SP2 and SP3, Windows Server 2003 SP2, Windows Vista SP2, Windows Server 2008 SP2, R2, and R2 SP1, Windows 7 Gold and SP1, Windows 8, and Windows Server 2012 do not properly handle objects in memory, which allows physically proximate attackers to execute arbitrary code by connecting a crafted USB device, aka "Windows USB Descriptor Vulnerability," a different vulnerability than CVE-2013-1285 and CVE-2013-1287.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:-:sp2:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:*:sp3:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2003:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp2:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:sp2:x86:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:itanium:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:sp2:x64:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:sp1:x86:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:sp1:x64:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:r2:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:r2:itanium:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8:-:-:x86:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8:-:-:x64:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2012:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
